error.error_401: Invalid API key, or your API key hasn't been activated yet. Check your API key, then wait a few minutes and try again. This is a very common error. See https://openweathermap.org/faq#error401
error.error_404: Invalid location. Check your latitude and longitude values and try again. See https://openweathermap.org/faq#error404
error.error_429: Too many requests. Wait a few minutes and try again. See https://openweathermap.org/faq#error429
error.error_5XX: Something went wrong. Please try again later. See https://openweathermap.org/faq#error500
error.unknown: An unknown error occured. Please raise an issue on the GitHub repository.

data.update_interval: Update Interval (in seconds, the best for the free plan has been autofilled)

user.description: Please create a free account at https://home.openweathermap.org/users/sign_up and confirm your account. You should receive an API key in your email. Enter it below.
user.title: NWS Alerts Setup
